scripts.app:run: cd app && docker build -f ./Dockerfile.dev --no-cache -t dinkilink_app:dev . && docker run -it --rm --network dinkilink_default -v ${PWD}:/app -v /node_modules -p 3100:3000 -e CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true dinkilink_app:dev
scripts.server:run: cd api && docker build -f ./Dockerfile.dev -t dinkilink_server:dev . && docker run -it --rm --network dinkilink_default -v ${PWD}:/api -p 8080:8080 -p 40000:40000 --env-file=../db/.env dinkilink_server:dev
scripts.db:run: docker run -it --rm --network dinkilink_default --name dinkilink_db --net-alias dinkilink_db -v db-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -v ${PWD}/db/init-db.sh:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sh:ro -p 5432:5432 --env-file=./db/.env postgres:13
scripts.api:refresh: yarn api:clean && docker-compose build && yarn docker-compose up
